resources.string: We will send you an OTP on the given mobile number

Now capturing an 3-D image came into reality, user can tap on the screen to place a 3-D object, also one can capture the image and the image will be automatically stored to cloud.
To use these features one need to authenticate himself through mobile number.

The app has been best designed taking into the consideration of users security and privacy. 
Uploading images to cloud is completely safe and secure and we are regularly working on it to give you much better experience.

Any kind of inconvenience is regretted

1) Navigation Component for app navigation 
2) Firebase Authentication for authenticating user
3) Firebase Storage to store images
4) Firebase Realtime Database for realtime update
5) AR Core for building augmented reality experience
6) Sceneform For rendering realistic 3-D scenes
